metadata.feature_description: Shows most popular content across the community with view counts and engagement metrics

steps.expected: User successfully logged in with access to PersonaBar
steps.actual: User successfully logged in. PersonaBar visible with Dashboard, Content, Manage, Settings options.

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard and hover to reveal submenu
steps.expected: Dashboard submenu shows Site Analytics and Community Analytics options
steps.actual: Dashboard submenu expanded showing 'Site Analytics' and 'Community Analytics' menu items

steps.action: Click on Community Analytics to open the module
steps.expected: Community Analytics dashboard loads with Popular Content section visible
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel is completely blank/white. Module fails to load due to JavaScript error: 'TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function' in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025

issues: CRITICAL BUG: Community Analytics module fails to initialize due to JavaScript error
Error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function
The utility object does not have the serializeCustomDate method available when the module initializes
This prevents ALL Community Analytics functionality including Popular Content Analytics from being accessible

test_scenarios.scenario_name: View popular content for different time periods

steps.action: Attempt to access Popular Content section in Community Analytics
steps.expected: Popular Content section visible with time period options (Day/Week/Month/Year/Custom)
steps.actual: Unable to test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Blocked by critical bug preventing Community Analytics module from loading

steps.action: Attempt to access Popular Content pagination controls
steps.expected: Pagination controls (prev/next) visible for navigating content results
steps.actual: Unable to test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Blocked by critical bug preventing Community Analytics module from loading

steps.action: Attempt to view popular content sorted by engagement metrics
steps.expected: Content items displayed with engagement percentages, sorted by popularity
steps.actual: Unable to test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Blocked by critical bug preventing Community Analytics module from loading

steps.action: Attempt to view Popular Content section with no data available
steps.expected: Message 'No Popular Content' displayed when no data available
steps.actual: Unable to test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Blocked by critical bug preventing Community Analytics module from loading

observations: CRITICAL: The Community Analytics module has a JavaScript initialization error that prevents it from loading entirely
The error 'TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function' occurs in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js at line 1025
Code review shows the analytics.js file calls utility.serializeCustomDate() during initialization, but this method is not available on the utility object
The Popular Content section is defined in social-dashboard.html with a 'popularContent' Knockout.js binding that displays content items with engagement percentages
The backend API (CommunityAnalyticsController.cs) has GetPopularContent and GetModulePopularContent endpoints that appear to be correctly implemented
This is a frontend JavaScript dependency issue, not a backend API issue
All planned test scenarios for Popular Content Analytics are blocked by this critical bug
